    public abstract class Api
extends java.lang.Object
    Common interface for the drone set of api classes. Created by Fredia Huya-Kouadio on 7/5/15.

      • getApi

        protected static <T extends Api> T getApi(Drone drone,
                                          java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<Drone,T> apiCache,
                                          Api.Builder<T> apiBuilder)
        Retrieves the api instance bound to the given Drone object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Specific api instance type.
        Parameters:
        drone - Drone object
        apiCache - Used to retrieve the api instance if it exists, or store it if it doesn't exist.
        apiBuilder - Api instance generator.
        Returns:
        The matching Api instance.
